time_of_occurence: Throughout the year (severe during rainy season)
incidence: Severe yield loss due to growth retardation
place_of_occurence: Bogor, Lembang, Tasikmalaya, Garut and Malang, Java, Indonesia
reference: Rachmat, Alan S.; Kobayashi, Takao; & Oniki, Masaomi. 1994. Angular Leaf Spot of Ramie, Boehmeria nivea, Caused by Pseudocercospora boehmeriae in Indonesia. Japanese Journal of Tropical Agriculture, 38(1): 59–64.
